ppy/helm-charts.summary: Recent activities include multiple updates to the index.yaml file, enhancements to storage RWX documentation, addition of probes configuration, and updates to various charts including the osu-web chart. These changes aim to improve the functionality and performance of the helm-charts repository, with fixes and enhancements to existing features.

ppy/osu-web.summary: Recent activities focus on improving the multiplayer functionality, including requiring the multiplayer API to join a room, adding a leave team button, and implementing explicit TypeScript types. These changes aim to enhance the overall user experience and interaction within the osu-web repository, with a focus on team management and event handling.

ppy/osu.summary: A recent update enabled the seasonal feature, indicating a focus on introducing or enhancing seasonal content within the osu repository. This change suggests an effort to provide a more dynamic and engaging experience for users, with seasonal updates potentially bringing new gameplay elements or challenges.

ppy/osu-framework.summary: A recent pull request aims to add support for locking screen orientation on iOS, specifically designed for use in osu! during gameplay. This proposed feature would enhance the mobile gaming experience, allowing for a more immersive and distraction-free environment by locking the screen orientation.
